channel.title: Spreadsheet on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Spreadsheet on Climate Tools

item.title: Diagnostic Spreadsheet for Analysis of Water Quality Data in relation to Growth Requirements of Submerged Aquatic Vegetation
item.description: Developed By: CBP Summary: The Diagnostic Spreadsheet for Analysis of Water Quality Data analyzes Total Suspended Solids (TSS) and Chlorophyll data to determine if minimum light requirements for submerged aquatic vegetation (SAV) growth are met at a given station.

item.title: Percent Light at Leaf Calculator
item.description: Developed By: CBP Summary: The Percent Light at Leaf (PLL) calculator can be used to estimate the percentage of light penetrating the water column and reaching submerged aquatic vegetation (SAV) leaf surface at a given depth.
